textObjects.text:
•	The Habit Hazards –Sappers that steal your energy, the Blocker Bots that prevent you from eating healthy, and the Scorchers that trick you into dehydration—have united for the first time into an unbeatable force…and have descended upon New York City!
•	The Habit Heroes - Agent Dynamo, Agent Fuel, and Agent Quench – respond to the emergency, charging into the city to save its citizens…but the threat is too big for them to handle alone! To combat the Hazards’ mysterious new technology, they seek out the world-famous Armored Avenger, Iron Man! 
•	But when the Hazards cause even the brilliant Tony Stark to fall into old unhealthy habits, can even the combined might of the Habit Heroes and Iron Man be enough to stop the Hazards latest evil endeavor?

series.name: BlueCross BlueShield of Georgia Presents:  Iron Man & Habit Heroes (2013)
